question: It is suggested that everyone should have a car, a television and a fridge. Do disadvantages of this development for society outweigh advantages?”
text: According to some experts, they are of prospective that each and every family should have a vehicle, television for entertainment and also a refrigerator. From my point of view, this development has more positive effects compared to negative one and they are listed out in ensuring paragraphs.

Firstly, discussing about the car that made our way of living smother and faster in terms of transportation facility. There are abundant other reason for owning a vehicle such as own transportation mode. Secondly, television, which was a remarkable invention. Lastly fridge is nowadays one of the essential requirement as it assists in preserving foods and various household groceries. The main purpose and benefit is, preservation of eatery products and various fluids.

In conclusion, procuring these firms are ought to be in this world of modernization and also a necessary which augments to better and easier lifestyle. They are the machineries that are proving to have more advantages than disadvantages.
